Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
Server class is the main class of the server side. It accepts connections from clients and delegate them to a ClientConnection instance for each client. The server is also responsible for the global lobby, where clients are asked to choose a game to enter in, for creating GameLobby instances and for retrieving from the disk the participants of the previous saved games (so when a clients connect, it is notified if he has a previous saved game that he was participating). Each GameLobby (and so each game) is identified by an id, this permit to distinguish games that are currently running and also games that are saved on disk.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Continue looping accepting socket connections from clients and submitting them to a SocketClientConnection per connection. Before this, the server retrieve from the disk the participants of each previously saved game
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The server main, that creates the instance of the server after a correct port is inserted
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments of the program

    • deleteGame

      protected void deleteGame(int gameId)
      Delete the game from the games map and also from the disk, if the game was already saved
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game to delete

    • deleteSavedGame

      protected void deleteSavedGame(String client)
      Delete a saved but not restored game from the disk if a participant decide to not resume the game. The id of the saved game is obtained by searching in the participants of the saved games
      Parameters:
      client - the name of the client that decided to delete the saved game

    • deleteFile

      private void deleteFile(int gameId)
      Delete the file of a saved game (with the specified id) on the disk
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game

    • registerConnection

      public void registerConnection(String clientName, ClientConnection client) throws DuplicateNicknameException
      Register a connection from a client that have the specified nickname
      Parameters:
      clientName - the nickname of the client
      client - the connection with the client
      Throws:
      DuplicateNicknameException - if the nickname is already taken from someone else that is connected to the server

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection(String clientName)
      Remove the connection with the client that have the specified nickname
      Parameters:
      clientName - the nickname of the client

    • globalLobby

      public void globalLobby(ClientConnection client, String clientName)
      Insert the client on the global lobby of server. The server wil send to the client a message that contains the number of not started and not restored games and also details about them
      Parameters:
      client - the connection with the client
      clientName - the nickname of the client

    • checkPreviousGames

      private boolean checkPreviousGames(ClientConnection client, String clientName)
      Returns true if the client was participating in a not finished game saved on disk, otherwise false
      Parameters:
      client - the connection with the client
      clientName - the ickname of the client
      Returns:
      true if the client was participating in a not finished game saved on disk, otherwise false

    • getPreviousGame

      private Optional<PersistenceGameInfo> getPreviousGame(String clientName)
      Returns the persistence data of the not finished game on the disk that the specified client was participating if there is such a game, otherwise it returns an empty optional
      Parameters:
      clientName - the nickname of the client
      Returns:
      the persistence data of the not finished game on the disk that the specified client was participating if there is such a game, otherwise an empty optional

    • gameLobby

      public void gameLobby(int gameId, ClientConnection client, String clientName)
      Insert the specified client in the game lobby that have the specified id. If the lobby does not exist or if the game with that id is already started, an error will be sent to the client
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game
      client - the connection with the client
      clientName - the nickname of the client

    • handleLobbyError

      private void handleLobbyError(ErrorMessageType error, ClientConnection client, String clientName)
      Handles a lobby error if the clients request to participate in a not found game or in a started game
      Parameters:
      error - the type of lobby error
      client - the connection with the client
      clientName - the nickname of the client

    • createGame

      public int createGame(int numPlayers, boolean isExpertGame)
      Creates a new game with the specified number of players and rules and returns the id of the created game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players of the game
      isExpertGame - the rules of the game
      Returns:
      the id of the created game

    • restoreGameOfClient

      public int restoreGameOfClient(String clientName) throws NoSuchElementException
      Restore a previously saved game on disk where that contains the specified client in the participants and returns the id of that game. There is at maximum one saved game for each nickname
      Parameters:
      clientName - the nickname of the client
      Returns:
      the id of the restored game
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there isn't such a game on disk

    • saveParticipants

      public void saveParticipants()
      Save the participants of all active games and saved but not restored games in a separated file on the disk in order to retrieve the more quickly. This save is done asynchronously, and it is done everytime a new game starts and everytime a started or saved game is deleted

    • getFirstFreeId

      private int getFirstFreeId()
      Returns the first free game id on which a new game can be created.
      Returns:
      the first free game id on which a new game can be created.

    • onGameRestored

      protected void onGameRestored(int gameId)
      Removes the game with the specified id from the not restored games map after the specified game war restarted
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game restored game

    • quitGameOfClient

      protected void quitGameOfClient(ClientConnection connection, String clientName)
      Delete the game that the specified client has quit, if present, and puts the client in the global lobby
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection with the client
      clientName - the name of the client
